steps.content: What are the nutritional benefits of dragon fruit and generate an image of a dragon fruit smoothie?
Plan: 1) Search for the nutritional benefits of dragon fruit. 2) Generate an image of a dragon fruit smoothie. 3) Return the answer.
Searching for the nutritional benefits of dragon fruit.
Dragon fruit is rich in antioxidants, vitamin C, and fiber. It supports immune health, aids digestion, and promotes skin health.

Can you also tell me how to make a dragon fruit smoothie?
Plan: 1) Search for a recipe to make a dragon fruit smoothie. 2) Return the answer.
Searching for a recipe to make a dragon fruit smoothie.
Dragon fruit smoothie recipe: 1 cup dragon fruit, 1 banana, 1/2 cup yogurt, 1/2 cup almond milk, 1 tsp honey. Blend until smooth.
